meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Martha Adams Dave Higgins Richard Miller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #723.

td.p: Martha Adams, a medical transcriptionist from San Anonio, Texas
Dave Higgins, a stage hand originally from Iowa
Richard Miller, a psychiatrist from North Hollywood, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,200)

tr.td: U.S. HISTORY
CINEMATIC ROSES
CRABS
WORLD RELIGION
SPORTS
ACCORDING TO SPOCK
(Alex: Dr. Spock.)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Richard: What is the American federation of mine workers?)

the CIO (Congress of Industrial Organizations)

RichardDave
')
